index.name: DrTT-LTBVC_(Lua)
index.desc: Lua Plugins for the LilypondToBandVideoConverter (by Dr. Thomas Tensi)

metadata.description:
{tf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0
ouicompat\deflang2057\deflangfe2057 { onttbl { 0 roman prq2 charset0 Times New Roman;} { 1 nil charset2 Symbol;} } {\colortbl ;ed0\green0 lue255;} {\*\mmathPr\mnaryLim0\mdispDef1\mwrapIndent1440 }\viewkind4\uc1 \pard
owidctlpar\sa200\sl276\slmult1 0 s28  Reaper Plugins for the LilypondToBandVideoConverter 0\par  s22 Dr. Thomas Tensi, 2021 s28\par  s24  Overview 0\par  s22 The \ldblquote Reaper Plugins for the LilypondToBandVideoConverterdblquote software package provides Lua plugins for being used in the Reaper DAW ({{ ield{\* ldinst{HYPERLINK https://reaper.fm }}{ ldrslt{https://reaper.fm\ul0\cf0}}}}); they assist in using the LilypondToBandVideoConverter ({{ ield{\* ldinst{HYPERLINK https://github.com/prof-spock/LilypondToBandVideoConverter }}{ ldrslt{https://github.com/prof-spock/LilypondToBandVideoConverter\ul0\cf0}}}}) toolchain for generating notation videos from arrangement text files.\par
The four scripts provide the following services:\par
\pard{\pntext 1'B7	ab}{\*\pn\pnlvlblt\pnf1\pnindent0{\pntxtb'B7}}
owidctlpar i-360\li720\sa200\sl276\slmult1  ExportLilypond.lua: 0 transforms the notes of the selected MIDI item into a textual lilypond note/chord sequence and returns them in a text box,\par {\pntext 1'B7	ab}  ImportMidi.lua: 0 scans the current project for tracks with single MIDI items and replaces those by the corresponding track in an associated MIDI file filtering out unwanted MIDI items before import,\par {\pntext 1'B7	ab}  MakeRegionsFromStructureTrack.lua: 0 either makes regions from a region structure track with structural MIDI items or generates that structure track with MIDI items from the current regions, and\par {\pntext 1'B7	ab}  NormalizeStructuredMidiTracks.lua: 0 scans all tracks with some specific prefix and normalizes their enclosed MIDI items by removing reverb, chorus and delay control codes and setting velocities to some default\par
\pard
owidctlpar\sa200\sl276\slmult1 They rely on several additional Lua modules provided in the package.\par }

category.name: PluginsForLTBVC
category.desc: Lua Plugins for the LilypondToBandVideoConverter (by Dr. Thomas Tensi)
